Class IntMsg

java.lang.Object
  peersim.bittorrent.SimpleEvent
      peersim.bittorrent.SimpleMsg
          peersim.bittorrent.IntMsg

public class IntMsg
extends SimpleMsg

This class is a SimpleMsg and acts as a container for a message that uses only an integer value.
